FuncDef: This command creates an index entry containing authentication data for a dynamic service SAP. Up to 32 indexes can be created per user name entry, representing up to 32 dynamic service SAPs that can be instantiated with a single dynamic service data trigger. One of the dynamic service SAPs must be the data trigger SAP.Thenoform of this command removes the index entry from the user name entry in the local authentication database configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the index entry identifier. Values-1 to 32.
